getRecipientBalance().notice: return the balance of this contract. Note that this method will revert on configuration error (invalid relay address)

getSender().notice: return the sender of this call. if the call came through the valid RelayHub, return the original sender. otherwise, return `msg.sender` should be used in the contract anywhere instead of msg.sender
